job.name: VisdomStart
job.description: Start Visdom Server in a Docker Container

info.name: pca.service.description
info.value: A flexible tool for creating, organizing, and sharing visualizations of live, rich data

task.name: StartVisdom
task.description: Start Visdom Server in a Docker Container as a Service (docker start)

script.code:
export INSTANCE_ID=$(docker run -d -p 8097 -h visdom --name $variables_instance_name -w /root activeeon/visdom_server python -m visdom.server -port 8097)
docker inspect --format='{{(index (index .NetworkSettings.Ports "8097/tcp") 0).HostPort}}' $INSTANCE_ID > host_port
